authors: Department of Neurology, Carver College of Medicine, University of Iowa, Iowa City, IA 52242, USA. Electronic address: nandakumar-narayanan@uiowa.edu.
Department of Biology and Center for Behavioral Neuroscience, American University Washington, DC, USA. Electronic address: mark.laubach@american.edu.
text: Functional anatomy in frontal cortex has been elusive and controversial. A new study combines neuronal ensemble recordings and optogenetics to map a functional gradient in rodent prefrontal cortex that supports inhibitory control.
title: Inhibitory Control: Mapping Medial Frontal Cortex.
